slide.headline: Welcome to Potlatch 2!
slide.text: We'll show you how to make changes to OpenStreetMap's free map of the world. To get started, click the 'Next' button.

slide.headline: Putting a point on the map
slide.text: Let's start with the single easiest change you can make: putting a new point on the map. You'll see a big panel of icons on the left of the window. Find one - a shop, maybe, or a restaurant - and drag it onto the map.

slide.headline: Putting a point on the map
slide.text: Great stuff. Now let's give it a name. Click in the 'name' box on the left, then type its name and press Enter.
